content:
After the countdown ends,
when they're watering the fields,
stop them with the insect net!
info: 第二天-游戏失败-和云果对话_云果线1

content:
(test) T-too much water isn't good for the crops mah~!
Quick, we need to stop them!
I can't find the right tools... I guess we'll use the insect net mah~!
info: 第二天-游戏失败-和云果对话_云果线1
